msbt.message: Ohmigosh, ! I've been trying to find you so I could tell you Uh-oh.It totes slipped my mind. It's the worst when that happens! Maybe I need more coffeeorrrrr less

! Have I ever got news for yoooooou!Did you know that wasps are the ONLY insect that can distend their jaws far enough toHaaaaang on. That doesn't make ANY sense at all!<10_4 /> What insect was I thinking of?!

, I was going to ask you somethingbut I don't know if you'd give me an answer.I meanit's SUPES personal. So I think it'd be mega rude to ask So I'm not going to do it.But you're wondering what it was, aren't you?
?!I was thinking about something but you surprised the haute out of my couture, and I forget what it was!
